title: Episode 168 w/ Rick Ross
itunes:title: Episode 168 w/ Rick Ross
description:
N.O.R.E & DJ EFN are the Drink Champs. On this episode the Champs talk game with Drink Champs Alumni - Rick Ross. The Big Boss talks about building his empire and learning from moguls like Jay-Z, J.Prince, etc. Ross also speaks on supporting Meek Mill through his criminal justice battle, dating Foxy Brown, the importance of saving money and diversifying his businesses, his new album PORT OF MIAMI 2 and much more! 

Follow:

http://www.facebook.com/crazyhoodproductions 

N.O.R.E. 

http://www.instagram.com/therealnoreaga 

http://www.twitter.com/noreaga
